column4: Ubuntu 10.10 aye ... Anyone think the netbook edition is sexy ? Or is it an utter waist of time ?
would you ever think about running it on a standard laptop ? .. 15 Inch Dell Inspiron 6400, Core2Duo, 2G Ram, 100G HD, ATI X1400 Graphics ... About the power of todays netbooks ;)
deffo not , that laptop is capable of alot more
